Title: How To Use A Gas Grill: Learn In A Step-By-Step Guide
Content:
If you are a grill enthusiast, always waiting for an opportunity to cook up delicious and soft pieces of meat and veggies, it is necessary that you know best how to use a gas grill too. So, here, let’s embark on a step-by-step journey to understand the exact ways of using a gas grill. Before digging into how to use a gas grill, you need to get the best gas grill that is suitable for you

1. Checking your fuel supply and grease management system

When you feel like ready to grill, always begin by verifying your fuel supply to ensure you have enough. It is also recommended in this step to take a look to some safety tips before using your gas tank. For instance, always verify that the gas has no outside damage (bumps, cracks or holes). It is also important make sure there is no leak in the gas system: by applying a little soapy water to the hoses and joints, you can easily make sure that the gas system is completely sealed; if you don’t observe any bubble, you are ready to use your gas tank.

2. Make sure grilling items are in place

Remove any other items that you won’t be using at the moment of verification to be completely sure that everything is fine and ready to use on your grill. It is always good to have all these items in one place and make sure they are going to be ready just when you need them after the verification.

3. Preparing the food items

After the verification of your grill it will be a good time to prepare your food items (cooking utensils and the food to be prepared), it is important to have all food items fully prepared and ready to go before you begin; so you can enjoy your grilling experience.

4. Pre-heating by putting the burner on high

One main step will be to pre-heat your grill, by turning all burners on high and closing the hood for 15-20 minutes; this step is really important to maintain a stable temperature so your food can be prepared evenly and turns out to be delicious.

5. Checking the usage of oil on the cooking grids

When you make sure that the grill is enough pre-heated, you can start to lightly coat your cooking grids with oil; then close the lid. After closing the lid you need to set your control knobs to your desired cooking temperature.

6. With more than one burner

Talking about grills with more than one burner, it is highly recommended to set a hot side and a warm side. It is highly recommended to set one side of your grill to medium hot or hot as desired; and the other side to medium low or medium; to have two different options while grilling; depending on the food you are cooking and your taste of food. The preparation of the sides lets you sear on one side of your grill and finish cooking a well prepared dish on the other side. It also provides a safe place for you to move the food just in case the hot side starts to get too hot to handle.

7. Start with the Grilling Procedure

In order to grill as an expert, always keep consistency really simple by placing food on the grill from left to right and back to front. Before turning your first side up give one or two items a little nudge, if they don't want to release they are probably not ready to be turned. Let them cook for another minute or two depending on the temperature and your taste of food. When they are ready, just continue the left to right back to front order when flipping and removing the food you are cooking.

8. Keep the Hood Closed

As much as you like the sensation of heat while grilling it is way better to keep your hood closed as much as possible, your food will cook faster, more evenly, with a better flavor and is going to be safer for you.

9. Get ready a cast iron pot or skillet

It is really useful to have on hand a cast iron pot or skillet especially if you are planning on making quick sauces, boiling marinades, or warming dessert toppings. They heat evenly and their extra weight keeps them more stable on the grill.

10. Tent food with foil to rest

When your food is ready, remove it from the grill and proceed to tent with foil to rest; this step is done to preserve the food temperature so you can enjoy all the flavor of your food.

11. "Burn-off" your grill

While resting, it is really important to "burn-off" your grill; by setting all burners to high, closing the hood, and allowing your grill to burn off the excess residue.

12. Turn off the grill and lightly brush off any excess

Once the grill stops smoking, turn it off and lightly brush off any excess with a wire brush; this step is also important since you don’t want to mix food flavor in your next grilling session.

13. Final wipe with oil

Finally, give your grids another light wipe with oil and your grill will be ready the next time you want to grill.  

*Source

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YlA-FPDylDE

Tips & Tricks of Using a Gas Grill

So, now that you are aware of the steps involved in the process of cooking up some great meals, here are some more tips and tricks of using a gas grill in the most desired manner.
  • Prepare your meat for grilling well beforehand through marinades and rub recipes. It will add to the flavor when grilled
  • When grilling burgers and patties, avoid pressing them down for the sizzling sound or flipping them too many times. The less you touch, the more juices they will retain, promising a taste that stays with you for long
  • With ribs and steak, go for slow cooking and try to keep the meat a little bit away from the direct flames
  • No matter how hungry and anxious you are, wait for a good 10 minutes after the grilling is done to let the meat reabsorb the juices and get as tender and delicious as you want it to be
Last but not the least, always make sure engaging in safe grilling. So, keep a fire extinguisher at hand or around the spot to prevent rare but accidental situations from arising.

Title: 5 Best Natural Gas Grills For The Money (July 2018 Updated)
Content:
Grilling is a fun activity that you traditionally do in your backyard or your deck, gathered with friends or family. That’s what the best natural gas grills are great for. Good, old-fashioned backyard grilling. They’re not really meant to be moved around all the time, although some of them might have some of the characteristics of portable grills. Let’s take a look to see what these units can offer you with. We’ve selected a few great ones and hopefully you’ll be able to choose which one is for you. So, here you go. [supsystic-tables id=13]

Is Choosing a Natural Gas Grill a Wise Option?

If you decide to go with gas for your grilling experience, you should know that gas grills come in two flavors: propane and natural gas. Natural gas grills have certain pros and a few drawbacks too, which you must be aware of before deciding on the brand or model etc.

Increased Convenience

These units work by virtue of direct lines to the grill and this set up is way more convenient than the propane powered one any day. There is no risk of running out of fuel as you can access as much of natural gas you need to cook up a tasty meal.

More Economical

If you are a grill master in the true sense, whipping up a BBQ every now and then, this one using natural gas can save a lot of your costs. The natural ones are supposed to be operating at 1/6th of the cost of propane. In fact, with natural gas, the fun part is the more frequent you are using the grill; the less will be your monthly expenditure because you are making the most of the available resource. One refill of a propane tank costs you higher than a monthly gas bill for sure.

Care for the Environment

There’s no point harming the environment in the process of serving ourselves with tasty foods. With a natural gas one, you have lesser carbon dioxide emissions while the entire process remains cleaner as well.

Is Natural Gas Grill Without a Drawback?

Well, each option has its cons and a natural gas unit is not without any. These can be a little difficult to set up, not to mention that the upfront costs can be on the higher side too. The supply line of the gas is fixed and hence, you can never move around the unit unlike portable ones. But that being said, if you are most comfortable grilling at your place, then either the installation or the immobility shouldn’t be a problem at all. We say, go ahead and give them a try. They might just be the right grilling solution for you. Otherwise, you can refer more to other types of gas grills, we think you'll find the right one for you

Reviews of the Best Natural Gas Grills for 2018

1. Weber 47100001 Spirit S210 Natural Gas Grill

Let’s start with a great natural gas BBQ grill from The Weber Spirit. This grill amazingly blends style and function in the most desired manner. It has a sleek design, with stainless steel shroud, door and burners and porcelain enameled cast-iron cooking grates, which are easy to clean and require no seasoning. The cook box is made of cast aluminum, meaning it’s durable and requires minimal maintenance. It has a large main cooking surface, and a necessary warming rack. It also features two side shelves, which give you enough room to prepare your food and hang your utensils although raising or lowering them is not as smooth as they should be. The grill comes with Weber’s own invention: Flavorizer Bars system, which catches drippings and vaporizes them to add more flavor to your food. Whatever drippings are not vaporized are drained out. Connecting this grill to the gas line is easy, with its 10-foot hose.

Pros

  • Sturdy construction
  • Includes long, flexible hose
  • Plenty of space for cooking and preparation

Cons

  • Side shelves can be difficult to raise and lower
  • Temperature can be tricky to control
Check Price on Amazon

2. Weber 66000001 Genesis II S-310 Natural Gas Grill

Let’s go for another Weber made model that comes under $1000. They have been perfecting the art of grill making for over fifty years, so it’s no surprise that they make some pretty good ones. This grill has a good built quality and it seems and feels solid and robust. It provides lots of cooking space with three stainless steel high performance burners, cast-iron cooking grates and a warming rack, along with two side shelves and six tool hooks, all in an open cart design. Weber’s advanced technologies are also evident in this grill. It includes Weber’s Flavorizer Bars for food with an extra touch of flavor and a new grease management system, which reduces the risk of flare-ups. You also won’t have to worry about your food being burned in this grill, since it’s iGrill ready and you can have your phone alert you when you’re supposed to take it out. How far has technology come! This grill is not exactly cheap, but it might very well be worth the money.

Pros

  • Individually controlled burners
  • Easy assembly
  • Compatible with iGrill

Cons

  • Grease tray is always exposed
  • Temperature can be hard to regulate
Check Price on Amazon

3. Napoleon T410SBNK Triumph Natural Gas Grill

A budget-friendly model from Napoleon, this particular unit might not be of premium quality but it has everything you want in a grill. In fact, if you are looking for a portable and light grill that does not consume much space, you can certainly go for this one. While promising a robust construction that is durable, it also has a great design and looks stylish wherever you place it, making you a proud owner for sure. It has three independently controlled steel stainless steel burners and a porcelain enameled cast iron cooking grids, which help provide consistent and evenly distributed heat and prevent food from getting stuck. The independent burners allow for an easier and more accurate control of the temperature. The grill also has two foldable shelves with utensil holders. One of the shelves includes a side burner. So, you see, you will not be exactly missing the features of a more expensive grill with this one, even though it’s not as high-end. In fact, you will even enjoy one feature not included in most other grills: an incorporated bottle opener, so you have to run looking for one in a drawer when you or your friends want to open your drink. The Napoleon one is certainly a lot of grill for the money.

Pros

  • Compact design with fast heating abilities
  • Independently controlled burners and integrated thermometer
  • Easy to clean
  • Roomy area underneath

Cons

  • The drip pan is made of aluminum foil
  • Not a very high-end model
Check Price on Amazon

4. Napoleon LEX605RSBINSS Natural Gas Grill

This one is another model from Napoleon, which is also a premium quality unit with a lot of power to help you cook meals on a pretty large scale. However, the price, too, is on the higher side though it often seems justified compared to all the features incorporated in this model. Napoleon is a well-known brand and it is well-known for producing some high-quality models striking the right balance of robustness and technological innovations. Their grills go from mid-range to upper range. This high-end model has six burners, which are responsible for all the power this grill can deliver. The construction is all in stainless steel, including the side shelves, which you can use as working space with the included cutting board, as a cooler, as a condiment storage space, or as a side burner. Apart from the six burners, the grill also has a rear infrared burner. So, in one grill, you have the possibility to go from searing to baking like and oven to rotisserie roasting, all the while you’re making your favorite sauce on the side burner and your friends and family are enjoying cold drinks right out of the ice box. It also has some little touches: for example, the control knobs are backlit, which just makes it look really cool and sophisticated and adds to the general feel of quality this grill has. This is one true versatile grill and one of the best outdoor natural grills out there. If you have free reign on your spending, this is definitely a great high- quality grill to go for.

Pros

  • Great build quality
  • Achieves high temperatures
  • Full featured
  • Backlit control knobs

Cons

  • Not really for people on a budget
  • Grill is quite heavy
Check Price on Amazon

5. Dyna-Glo Black &Stainless Premium Grill, 5 Burner

We continue with a gorgeous grill from the reputed brand Dyna-Glo. This grill just looks good. Sporting an elegant cabinet two-door design, it is very well-built, and is meant to be used in any weather, sunshine, rain or snow. It’s a great model under $500 too, offering good value for your money. It has a double-wall firebox with five stainless steel burners that deliver lots of power over an ample cooking surface. There are three heavy gauge cooking grates, also in stainless steel. The lid has a double-wall liner, which retains heat better and improves the cooking efficiency of the burners, and it also has heavy gauge steel end caps. The unit comes with a side burner, for side dishes and sauces, and infrared rotisserie burners, so you’ll have more cooking options. You’ll have no problems cooking full meals in this grill or checking the grill zone temperature with the integrated temperature gauge. What you have in this grill is not only a grill, but a complete grilling/cooking/roasting solution, one in which you can cook pretty much anything you can think of (and of almost any size). The surface of the unit gets too hot too fast, which can be a little troublesome especially for the beginners.

Pros

  • Ample cooking surface
  • Heats up fast
  • Easy to assemble

Cons

  • Surface can get too hot
  • Gas hose could be longer
Check Price on Amazon

Final Thoughts

We’ve shown you some pretty good ones, but what is the Best Natural Gas Grill for 2018? We’ll give you our appreciation, but it’s ultimately for you to decide. The best model is always the one, which balances all the necessary features such as cooking potential, size, material etc. and yet does over make you go over budget. So, while some models are really good, their high price point becomes their main drawback. With all these factors in mind and with careful consideration of the fact that spending too much on a grill is definitely not something everyone is willing to do, we suggest you to go for one of the Weber models. The Weber grills we included in the list are also well-built, they have a lot features and do not cost as much. With a Weber, you’ll get a good grill at a good price. The decision is, of course, yours. We just want you to know the best options in the market you have, so you can go ahead and get the natural gas grill that’s right for you.

Title: 8 Best Grill Accessories For Your Outdoor Party (July 2018)
Content:
There is quite never beating the feeling and excitement of a good evening BBQ and if there could be some sort of implements that would serve to provide a comfort and ease to the whole activity, then it should be made use of to the full. Often with the hard core grill enthusiasts, there is bound to be some favorite accessory and with these folks there is no separating the two. It is important that any grill accessory is affordable at best and this factor is a main consideration when picking out some of the most useful of tools used at a grill site. A key feature of the present day markets is the need to be presentable; this is something that had been lacking in merchandise of the older days. Laid out below are some really cool accessories that would bring in utility and purpose to the whole BBQ exercise than ever before.

1. BBQ Grill Mesh - Heavy Duty Non-Stick BBQ Grill & Baking Mats

When out on a grill trip, few people can quite do without the heavy duty grill mesh while handling the heavy cooking. More than being just convenient, the grill would offer a convenience that is really welcome during the BBQ. The grill could well mean the difference between a well done steak and a burnt piece of meat. With the heavy duty non-stick grill, the master of the ceremonies can be sure of getting the meat done all nice and uniform. It must be said that this bit of grill can be used on any heat source, be it the electric heat, the gas fired grill or the hot coals. This would be without doubt a great gift idea as well. There are certain aids in activities that go on to offer an increased set of comforts and this grill mesh does just that on any grill day. Product Highlight: A tough construction that could well take any type of work involved. It could well be indestructible. Price: The BBQ Grill Mesh is on at amazon for purchase.
Check Price on Amazon

2. 18" Grill Brush With Scraper

No grill is without the grime and sticky bits of meat that does get on most of the surfaces and particularly the hot spaces. So, a heavy duty scraper could be just the right thing to have around. This could well be the most essential implement when cleaning up afterwards and it would be a good idea to pay attention to this part of the grill too. There can never be emphasizing the need to clean up after a grill as it would be the healthier of the options. It really would not help to cause ill health by disregarding the cleanliness of the grill at any time. This could be a scraper that would stand up to any sort of use and never to offer any complaints as such. Product Highlight: There is a simplicity of form and function which would make it simple to clean as well as use. When it comes to cleaning up, this product would be right on top. Price: The 18" Grill Brush with Scraper can be had at Amazon.
Check Price on Amazon

3. Kaluns™ BBQ Grill 19 Piece Utensil Set

No grill is complete without the tools of the trade so to speak. The grill master must be prepared to handle the toughest of meats as well as the delicate fish skewer that can come about on a typical grill. With this grill utensil set, the most types of implements are included so as to make any further additions unnecessary at best. It is important that the right kind of knife is on hand for use when the need so arises. The strong point about this set is that it has managed to pack in the most utensils all in a small space and this is no mean feature. From being just flexible, the set provides a specialized set of tools that is just right for the grilling occasion and no more. There is a well complemented carry case that contains the whole set and with as little fuss as possible. Product Highlights: There is a very practical approach involved that has seen the provision of a comfortable carry case. The set of tools can be put to use by both the experienced grill master as well as the novice that is setting out in grilling. Price: The Kaluns™ BBQ Grill 19 Piece Utensil Set is available at Amazon.
Check Price on Amazon

4. Arres XL BBQ Grilling Gloves

It really would not be a comfortable feeling to have a burnt or chapped hand while on a grill. This would in many instances point to the lack of ability on the part of the grill master. But the most experienced of grill operators would take sufficient precautions when it comes to accidents on the grill and the BBQ gloves are just the right choice to keep away the burnt fingers. The feature about this Arres BBQ gloves is that it does accommodate the largest of palms and this cannot be taken lightly. There are a number of manufacturers that do produce gloves for the BBQ but rarely of the quality offered by Arres. There is no doubt those folks that would swear by the gloves for the spills that it has managed to prevent. That is a good thing to have about a product that is primarily aimed at keeping people from harm’s way. Product Highlight: Simple yet effective, this would be how best to describe the gloves. The exterior does make easy cleaning too. Price: The Arres XL BBQ Grilling Gloves is available at Amazon. There is never denying the feeling and emotions that a good outdoor grill could bring about and the above accessories do add to the comfort and user experience at any time. In many ways, the implements could well rekindle the dying interest in the grill. It could well be said that the prime reason that the tool or assessor got chosen in the above is for the simplicity being offered. It does work to the advantage to have something that is easy to clean up as well.
Check Price on Amazon

5. A wireless thermometer

Invest in a quality thermometer, especially the wireless one. This will improve your control over the temperature readings. You can use it as follows:
  • Stick the meat thermometer to the meat
  • Select the timer or temperature at the receiver
  • Select the type of the meat or go for a manual thermometer
  • Choices are mainly among fish, lamb, pork, veal, poultry, beef, and custom
  • Thermometer will make a beep when it reaches the prescribed temperature.
Product highlights: ThermoPro is the best choice if you want a durable yet price efficient thermometer. There is a rubber armor surrounding the thermometer which will make you relax as the thermometers are usually prone to fall and may crack. Price: Get the meat thermometer at a suitable price on Amazon.
Check Price on Amazon

6. The chimney fire starter

Pour charcoal into your chimney starter. Some of the paper towels are to be scrunched up along with a few spoons of oil and then expose it to light. The chimney is then to be placed over the paper towel ball and you will start up with your cooking within 10-20 minutes. Product highlights: The chimney starter has quite a good capacity. It has enough space to hold even a 22-/2 inch kettle grill. Price: Go for a Weber Rapidfire Chimney Starter at Amazon.
Check Price on Amazon

7. Solid bear claws for pork

Bear claws seem to be a blessing when it comes to transfer, lift, and shred meat. Use them for transforming pork butts to pulled pork or to shredded cooked chicken. You can also use them for holding meat while transferring or carving meat. Product highlights: These claws are very strong and durable. They are capable of shredding anything you throw on them. Keep them away from the reach of kids. Price: Get the price details of Taste N Bear Claws at Amazon.
Check Price on Amazon

8. Sturdy BBQ tongs

All of us avoid burning our hands while using grills, so the beat way of doing it is to have a good pair of Long tongs specially meant for grilling. The head of this 16” tongs is so wide that it slides easily under the food and grip it up. Hence you can have no excuse of dropping the piece of brisket. The 16” long tongs also keep the hands safe and clear from hot coals. Product highlights: The product is durable and made of stainless steel which ensures that it will not bend while lifting heavy pieces of meat. It is dishwasher safe and has a very comfortable grip. Price: OXO 16” grilling tongs are available at a suitable price on Amazon.
Check Price on Amazon
It is good to invest in some grilling accessories to be a good barbecue. This will save your time as well as prevents hassle which usually occurs while handling smokers or grills. And ultimately the BBQ will taste better.

Title: 5 Best Gas Charcoal Combo Grills: The Perfect Combination
Content:
You have probably wondered what the best equipment option would be when getting your barbecuing game on. As we believe, you cannot go wrong with grilling all year round, but for this to happen, a good grill has to be in presence. For this reason, the combination of charcoal and gas grill is the most advanced and efficient option for giving you fantastic food results and stress-free cooking. They are merely a merger of both the gas grill and charcoal grill but come with power cooking features and other cooking functions in some cases. Individually, each type of device could function alright, but perfection is the way to go. These combos will give you just that! They are specially designed to give you that flare when cooking and are made with modern technology to ensure that the cooking process is as seamless as possible. We have carefully handpicked 5 of the best gas charcoal combo grills from different brands for you and have reviewed them based on their versatile function, effectiveness, durability, cost, and warranty. That way you are on a comfortable cushion to choose the best option that works for you. [supsystic-tables id='14']  

Reviews of The Best Charcoal - Gas Combo Grills

1. Oklahoma’s Joe Longhorn Charcoal - LP Grill

A triple fueling grill; propane, charcoal, and wood chips is also a step further from many other dual fueling grills on the market. This propane charcoal grill combo produces at least 38 burgers on its 1,060 square inches of cooking surface area. Each separate fueling unit can be used at the same time, so you are guaranteed to feed a sizeable party. It is constructed of 6 porcelain coated wire cooking grates on the charcoal grill, three 3 burners on the gas grill, an added metal bottom shelf with plenty of space for keeping utensils and an attached thermometer. The grill grates are removable and dishwasher-safe making it effortless to clean. At an average cost of $400, this is a cool option with a 2-year warranty offering.

Pros

  • Wide cooking area
  • Triple function
  • Cost effective with a good warranty
  • Easy to clean

Cons

  • Poor attention to detail on the construction
Check Price on Amazon

2. Smoke Hollow 4-in-1 Gas Charcoal Grill PS9900

The highest priced combo on our list, averaging at $1000. Let see what it’s got! It offers 4 sections for cooking - a gas grill, charcoal grill, a 10,000 BTU side burner and an offset woodbox for searing. This gives you many different grilling options and enough space to make food when cooking. Also, switching between grilling options is made easy with its build which makes it easy to use by everyone. Its construction is quite sizeable, so this does not take up a lot of space. However, it is heavy weighing in at 218 lbs. but comes with 4 locking casters to support mobility and stability. With 860 square inches of cooking surface area, this gas and charcoal hybrid grill produces a decent amount of food (about 20 burgers which is alright for a medium sized get-together).

Pros

  • Great value for money
  • In-built casters for easy mobility
  • Easy to assemble
  • Excellent heat control

Cons

  • Poor sheet material, easily rusted
Check Price on Amazon

3. Dyna-Glo DGB730SNB-D Dual Fuel Grill

Like many other 2-tier combos with some competitive features, the Dyna - Glo has both the gas grill and charcoal function and an attached bottle opener. With collapsible side tables, it is the only hybrid gas charcoal grill on this list that provides extra space for working. This saves you the energy from going back and forth to prepare foods. Weighing in at 143 lbs. it comes with 2 casters and 2 wheels for mobility, however, this does not mean that it can be moved around easily. Its material makes up may be worrying as it is prone to quick rusts. The trick is to change its parts frequently to ensure a more extended usage. The grill grates are amazing as they lock in food juices just as well. They are easy to clean, and grease traps can be easily pulled out. It comes with a 1-year warranty.

Pros

  • Removable ash tray
  • Electric ignition
  • Integrated towel hooks and bars
  • Additional space for working

Cons

  • Poor material construction
Check Price on Amazon

4. Char-Griller 5050 Duo Gas & Charcoal Grill

This user-friendly make by the Char-Griller company is low on cost and has a conventional construction. It sits porcelain coated and sturdy cast iron grates that are excellent for heat transfers. The dual function of propane and charcoal with an offset firebox that can turn its charcoal grill into a smoker. This then makes it a 3-tier hybrid grill. There are hood mounted thermometers installed in each cooking chamber that is easily regulated. This makes it user-friendly and comfortable to use by any beginner. On the downside, the 5050 Duo is constructed of materials poorly chosen, hence you are likely to be replacing parts. However, you will find it to be easily assembled with clear manufacturer’s guidance which is also, easily cleanable after use. Averagely costing at a half of thousand dollars, this can be said to be a decent buy.

Pros

  • Produces good BBQ results
  • Simple to use
  • Easily assembled
  • An added smoking function

Cons

  • Too light-weighted for heavyweights
Check Price on Amazon

5. Char-Broil Gas2Coal Hybrid Grill

This is the smallest sized combo grill on our list and we have chosen this for its small cooking size. It is the ideal combo for a small family weighing at only 96 lbs. with a total of three 40,000 BTU primary burners and one 12,000 BTU side burner. This very simple designed grill is basically a gas grill with a specially designed charcoal pan that is inserted into the gas grill. This is the convertible option from gas to charcoal but both are not able to be used at the same time and is perfect for entry-level users. While the Char-Broil is one of the most inexpensive, it does not mean that it is poorly constructed or cheap by any means. Anyone on a very tight budget would be perfect using this grill. The Char-Broil company offers a 5-year warranty on its burners and 1-year warranty on every other part. This is a good deal for its make.

Pros

  • Easy to use
  • Easily convertible
  • Inexpensive
  • Porcelain-coated and stainless steel make

Cons

  • Undedicated charcoal grill
Check Price on Amazon

The Ultimate Choice

Our champion for this series will be Oklahoma’s Joe Longhorn Charcoal - LP Grill. This combo grill has the best build except for its lack of attention to detail on construction which can be fixed with easy-to-find tools. It has a wide cooking surface area that is ideal for big parties. With its 3 tier functionality; gas grilling, charcoal grilling, and smoking makes it perfect for cooking food with different methods to explore. It is designed with consideration of space in mind with an added option for the user to keep utensils. This is the kind of space-saving advantage we are talking about! It is very easy to clean with dishwasher-safe grates, so there is no need to stress over sponge and soap to clean them. Finally, it is affordable and the warranty option makes it not only the safest buy but also the best gas charcoal combo grill available.

Digging deeper: Why to buy a propane-charcoal grill combo?

Dual and more options

This device has the best of both worlds all in one. You get to have the gas grill which is easy to use and perfect for cold weather and the charcoal grill for smoky flavors which is ideal for warm climates. You will not need to worry about getting great results or worry about space for storing both gas and charcoal grills in the name of versatility. These inventions solve both needs at once. There is no use buying separate pieces of equipment which are single functional for grilling your foods because:
  1. They are not great value for money.
  2. They yield to time wastage in the long run.
  3. They reduce the options of flavor that you can make.
These machines provide you with both options and in some versions can sear, smoke and roast food - all in one device! It is the trendiest solution for the problems mentioned above and therefore should be a priority to save you the stress.

Your space is precious

There is nothing like having a spacious backyard. Apart from the fact that it has a clean look, it is also healthy for the soul. Jam-packing your backyard with different types of cooking equipment is not a good look and you should avoid this. This is why this invention came to be. It fits all the different grilling options into one and is made with unique designs to give your space that modern and fresh look.

Make more food

Investing in future needs is one of the wisest things you can do and invest in these combos are no exception. They give you multiple spaces to cook enough food that will serve medium to large sized parties. Nature will always bless you with an opportunity to share and celebrate, and these combination gas and charcoal grills will be the best support for this. They will make you fantastic food in larger quantities than they would with singular purposed devices. Do not compromise on this, you will thank us soon.

Spend wisely

Little drops of water make a mighty ocean so, little drops of money on the wrong cooking equipment will lead to mighty wastage. Ignore your fleshy cravings in order to save money on time. Multi-purpose machines may seem like a large sum at the first price look, but with just a little calculation you will realize that gas charcoal smoker and grill combos usually save you by 20% or more on cost. Manage your pocket well with these!

What should you then look for in your purchase?

Does it use at least propane and charcoal?

These devices should have a combination of either gaseous propane or liquid propane, and charcoal for fueling. If they offer other fuel sources like wood pellet fueling, it is a consideration. Ensure to check that these offerings are available and have kind words for its versatile functionality. Gas grills are used for faster cooking and more comfortable to clean but do not give off the traditional smokey flavor in foods that charcoal grills do. Charcoal grills instead require you to have some compelling skills for lighting coals and can be harder to clean. Having the backyard dual gas and charcoal grill makes life more relaxing as you can switch from one to the other or use both at the same time.

Consider your food size turnout

Most of these dual function grill combos are made to produce food for at least ten people in one round. However, this could still be a small number. Take a scan through your lifestyle and make a purchase that will serve the needs of medium to large sized servings based on your calculations of what you will entertain. We can recommend looking out for hybrid grills with a total cooking surface area of at least 400 square inches and on the gas grill with at least two burners.

What is the quality of make?

Before making a purchase, do a good research on what materials the gas and charcoal hybrid grill is made of just so you do not have a combo that is rusting 3 months down the line. Two of the best elements to look out for are stainless steel and porcelain. These are not easily corroded and will withstand the test of weather changes. Make sure to invest in a cover which will protect its durability even further.

Is it a rip-off?

Again, conduct enough research and compare pricing with various sales outlets as much as you can. The best dual fuel grills vary in cost according to their makes, but this does not mean a dash of cash on poor quality. One of the goals for these inventions is to save the customer cost so be keen on this. There are a few brands out there that are pricey based solely on name reputation that has been built, do not get carried away by this.
_yoast_wpseo_title: 5 Best Gas (Propane) Charcoal Combo Grills (%%currentmonth%% %%currentyear%%)

Title: Smoked Chicken Thigh Recipe That Will Give Your Taste Buds A Great Treat
Content:
Who does not love to have good food? Starters and side dishes are something without which the meal isn’t complete; chicken being the best option as it is not only affordable but also it tastes delicious. With the smoked chicken thigh recipes mentioned below you will be able to give your taste buds a great treat. Smoking adds a flavour of its own to the chicken thighs. With so many easy but tempting recipes to choose from you will find yourself trying out each and every one at some point or the other. And I also have an article about Smoked Chicken Breast Recipes to make the summer beterrrr!

Smoked Crusted Orange Chicken

This recipe has the most luscious and mouth-watering marinade ever. It is great for people loving a sweet and chili taste. The oranges add their own flavour to the chicken and thus making them tastier. [su_row class="ingredients-directions"] [su_column size="1/2" center="no" class=""][su_spoiler title="Ingredients" open="no" style="default" icon="chevron-circle"]
  • 6 chicken thighs that are with bone and skin
  • 2 cups of orange juice that is frozen
  • ½ cup of soy sauce
  • 1 tablespoon full of garlic powder
  • Any poultry spice rub of your choice
[/su_spoiler] [/su_column] [su_column size="1/2" center="no" class=""][su_spoiler title="Directions" open="no" style="default" icon="chevron-circle"]
  1. The skin and the excess fat from the chicken thighs are removed. The pieces are then put into a plastic bag and set aside.
  2. The frozen orange juice, soy sauce and the garlic powder are mixed together. Care should be taken to see that no water is added in the orange juice.
  3. The marinade is poured into the plastic bag containing the chicken and smashed together so that it coats the chicken well. The bag is placed in the refrigerator and kept overnight.
  4. The smoker is turned on at 250 degrees F. Apple woods can be used as wood chips.
  5. The chicken is taken out of the bag and the extra marinade is discarded. The chicken is then rubbed with any spice rub of your choice.
  6. The chicken thighs are placed on the smoker and allowed to cook for 2-3 hors.
  7. When the internal temperature of the chicken thighs reaches 165 degrees F, you know that the chicken is cooked through.
[/su_spoiler] [/su_column] [/su_row]

Recipe from Smoked 'n Grilled

Title: Best 2 Burner Gas Grills: 5 Top Picks For Barbecue Party

All of which are incorporated into these amazing units, which is why they are preferred among the experts. So after knowing this, we are sure that you will want to take a look at our list of the best 2 burner gas grills in the market. [supsystic-tables id=15]

Reviews of the Best 2 Burner Gas Grills

1. Char-Broil Signature TRU-Infrared 325 2-Burner Cabinet Liquid Propane Gas Grill

This is a small sized giant. It is perfect if you want to become a barbecue master and deliver amazing food for your party. It is not only the grill but also its premium features which include porcelain-coated cast iron grates and top-ported 443 Stainless steel burners which make this 2 burner infrared gas grill perfect for anyone. The cooking system allows you to cook with a greater temperature control using infrared technology. The Infrared heat is powered by its 2 Top Ported 443 Stainless steel burners helping to prevent hot and cold spots on the grill’s surface using less gas. Infrared grilling has become a trend for 2018 in outdoor cooking. An infrared grill comes with infrared technology as the main source of heat. In a regular gas grill, the flame heats the grates directly but in an infrared grill, there is an infrared element between the grates and the flame. So how does an infrared system work? Well, the answer is that the gas heats the infrared element which then radiates intense heat. Grill experts confirm that infrared grills are the best for searing meat, providing uniform heat and cutting down on flare-ups. Not only does it have 2 amazing infrared burner systems but also has a large and strong stainless steel door that protects the gas tank and allows additional storage of many items like wood chips, grill tools, sauces, and rubs. It has an easy to read, lid mounted temperature gauge to monitor temperature. The Steel lid and firebox stand have durable porcelain coating to stand up to any weather condition. Furthermore, there are folding side shelves, allowing this spectacular grill to give you the power to be a master griller.

Title: Best 5 Ceramic Kamado Grills For The Money In 2018
Content:
Putting together an awesome BBQ means having the right equipment. Kamado style grills are great due to their versatility and easy to use functions. Some of the best Kamado grills are known for their ability to distribute heat evenly throughout the grill which help to enhance flavors of food. If you’re a serious griller, you might want to look into purchasing one of these. Often times it can be very overwhelming when choosing a grill. So, for this reason, we have reviewed some of the best Kamado grills for the money. These are the best Kamado grills on the market for producing top-quality results. [supsystic-tables id=16]  

Reviews of the Best Kamado Grills for 2018

1. Pit Boss 71240 Kamado BBQ Ceramic Grill Cooker

This ceramic cooker is made by a reputed brand, which has become a household name in the BBQ and grilling domain. It is incredibly spacious, sizable and very well built making it one of the best ceramic grills. If you are in the market for a high-quality ceramic cooker with a lot of style and versatility, then this model might be the right one for you. It has two stainless steel grates so you can grill more than one type of food without making a mess. There is plenty of space within this grill eliminating any concern of having enough room to cook for the whole family. The body is made of a strong and heavy ceramic which provides efficiency for burning charcoal, while the top is made of cast iron. In addition, the damper allows you to easily control the temperature within the kamado cooker. The unit comes equipped with a large thermometer that is easy to read, so you can make sure at all times that the temperature is correct. It has two folding side shelves providing you with plenty of cooking space. You will also have enough space to prepare food so you won’t have to run from your grill to the prep table constantly.

Pros

  • Premium, sturdy construction with dual grilling gates
  • Accurate, easy to read thermometer
  • Lots of cooking space

Cons

This Kamado smoker is perfect for your backyard or if you want, you may attach it to your car for easy transportation. The particular model is one of the top-rated ceramic grills which can be used for roasting, smoking, baking, and searing. It is made of lightweight fiberglass insulation that is covered with steel which will protect your grill from cracks. The exterior is powder coated which means it never reaches an outside temperature that is too hot to touch when cooking. It also has two detachable side shelves, an extra cooking rack, and hooks for hanging your cooking utensils. It has two dampers: one at the top and one at the bottom. The top one is cast iron with numbered settings which is really useful when controlling the temperature. The bottom one has a dual function with a removable ash pan. This gorgeously designed kamado smoker is not only well constructed but also has loads of special features. The only probable downside is the difficulty in lowering the temperature when needed.

3. Char-Griller E06614 Akorn Jr. Kamado Kooker Charcoal Grill

Let’s take a look at another great grill manufactured by a very well-known brand. While this grill is a smaller size, it was created to have some premium functions featured on larger scale grills. What does that mean for you? You receive a grill that is not only designed for durability but also great to travel with. For the money, it’s the best Kamado grill option. While you are able to cook a decent amount of food on this grill, it won’t be the best choice if you’re going to be cooking for more than four people. Because of its size, it’s best for smaller families and small gatherings. This does not mean that this is not a good quality unit. It’s definitely been built to last with durable, lightweight material and designed to produce great cooking results, enhance flavor and lock smoke into whatever you’re grilling. It also holds heat really well which means you’ll be using less charcoal. It has dual flow dampers which allow for easier and better temperature control. Also, the grill has a hinged locking lid, a heat gauge and thick-walled insulation which are all features you would normally see on the best charcoal grills. The walls are made with 22-gauge steel which can maintain higher temperatures than those made with alternative materials. Using the dual dampers allows the temperature to be adjusted with accuracy, letting you go from very high to very low temperatures. While most models of this size have stainless steel grates, this grill has cast iron grates. The cast iron is extremely thick which is the best for heat retention. Although it adds weight, it also ensures durability. With proper care, you’ll probably never have to replace the grates. All of these features are available on a unit that can also be easily loaded up on a truck and taken on the road. All that you would need to bring along is a bag of charcoal and you’d be ready for a camping party.

Pros

  • Sturdy, durable construction
  • Dual flow dampers for better temperature control
  • Great heat retention

Cons

4. Kamado Joe Classic II

This value Kamado grill which is just as good as some premium-priced models, is elegantly well constructed to mimic the big green egg. This big green egg look-alike is not so much a knockoff as it is an alternative. It’s predecessor, the first classic model, introduced a unique multilevel grate and heat deflection system called “Divide and Conquer” which also comes as a standard feature on this model. The system consists of multi-level half-racks that double the cooking surface area. This makes it easier to create different cooking zones with the ability to cook food on different levels and cooking surfaces. It has an all aluminum, no rust top vent to maintain airflow consistently and precise. It also comes with a double-thick wire mesh fiberglass gasket for a superior air-tight seal. Pros

  • Plenty of features
  • Multi-level cooking
  • Backlit control knobs

Cons

  • Rather heavy
  • Steep price increase relative to the older model
Check Price on Amazon

5. Primo 774 Ceramic Charcoal Smoker Grill

The exterior of this model features a premium-grade ceramic blend design, coated with a scratch resistant porcelain glaze. It is made of the highest quality of ceramic available for increased efficiency and durability. The Primo 774 is a very versatile model allowing you to cook different foods at the same time. This enhanced versatility is attributed to the two-zone design of the model. Grills that use a large amount of fuel and much too fast can be a pain however, this one will never disappoint you. Its fuel efficiency allows you to cook plenty of food for three or four people while using only a small amount of charcoal. Whether you want to smoke, bake or grill this quality unit will give you ample scope for all options. The only problem is that you might take some time to get a hang of controlling the heat, which can be a bit tricky for beginners.

Pros

  • Superior design
  • Thermometer included

Cons

  • Controlling the heat is tricky
Check Price on Amazon

Conclusion

So what is the overall best Kamado Grill for 2018? The Pit Boss 71240 Kamado BBQ Ceramic wins the title with its very reliable and effective grill system. If you are looking for a reliable Kamado grill which is easy to use and fuel efficient, then the Pit Boss is undoubtedly the best choice of action. There may be other grill models on the market that will catch your eye with their design or fancy colors, but when it comes to certain features, the Pit Boss is the best overall unit you will find.  

What is the Kamado Style All About?

Kamados grills are perfect for residential use. They are fueled by charcoal and are modern versions of the Chinese and Indian earthenware cooking ovens that were first used several thousand years ago. Yes, they kind of look like giant eggs, hence why so of them are called big green eggs. They are made of ceramic or refractory materials which are the same materials that are used to make kilns, crucibles, and pizza ovens. These materials are chosen because of their ability to retain and radiate heat effectively. With that being said, Ceramic Kamado grills are becoming more and more popular in the grilling world.

Why Buying a Kamado Grill is a Good Decision?

Ceramic cookers are well insulated which allows the interior to absorb and radiate heat evenly, making them very good at holding steady temperatures. Once you get a Kamado cooker started and bring it to the desired temperature, the grill will maintain the temperature during the entire cooking process.. Kamados can be especially useful if you live in a colder climate or if you want to cook outdoors in the winter. Because ceramic is prone to cracking, some designs are built using modern fiber insulation clad in a steel casing. Although, each material has its strengths and weaknesses. Some cooks prefer the heat retention of ceramic over the steel models. On the other hand, steel doesn’t crack or rust.

Excellent Grilling Procedure

Kamados grills have the ability to get really hot which is great for searing thin meats like skirt steak that you want to cook fast. The problem that arises when Kamado grills get hot, is that they take forever to cool down making it difficult to create a two-zone setup. This is why many people think kamados work better as smokers and ovens than as grills. If you’re interested in getting some serious grilling done on one of these, then you’ll need a design that allows you to have two-zone cooking.

What Type of Charcoal is Suitable?

It is recommended by some manufacturers to use more expensive lump charcoal rather than briquettes. Supposedly, briquettes produce more ashes than lump charcoal and the ash can block the airflow as it builds up. However, some Kamado manufacturers produce their own lump charcoal, so their interests may just lie there. Generally, we recommend using briquettes in charcoal burners because they’re affordable, consistent, and readily available. Lump charcoal, especially the bargain-basement varieties, can be inconsistent and inefficient. Some bags of Lump charcoal are liable to have pulverized charcoal dust or large chunks of construction material. It's not unusual to find metal and plastic debris mixed in. It’s best to use high-quality lump charcoal with a Kamado style grill because it is easier to stir the charcoal while it sits at the bottom of the firebox.
_yoast_wpseo_title: 5 Best Kamado Grills For The Money (%%currentmonth%% %%currentyear%%)

Title: 5 Best Infrared Grills On The Market In 2018
Content:
For all BBQ lovers out there, choosing the right grill is a matter of huge debate and buyers are often confused about the type that would suit them the best. If the traditional gas grills or even the charcoal ones make you a little skeptical or lack confidence, you should definitely go for the best infrared grills as discussed here. While a traditional gas or charcoal grill can be inconvenient or it might not provide a sufficiently even heat source, which can cause parts of the food to be burned, others to be uncooked or maybe the food will be dry. With an infrared one, you can be sure that your food will be cooked thoroughly all over. Let’s take a look to see if an infrared grill is right for you, and if you already know you want one, then let us help you decide on the best. Here are the Best Infrared Grills on the market for 2018. [supsystic-tables id=17]

Why is an Infrared Grill a Suitable Choice for You?

An infrared grill is one that has a burner that produces infrared radiation. This is different to standard grills that cook food using a convection system. That is, the heat flows around the food through the air. The mechanism that goes into these units allows it to have certain advantages over gas or charcoal grills.

Enables Consistent Cooking

Infrared grills use radiant heat, which does not require air to travel; it can travel through a vacuum. The way the Earth is heated by the sun is an example of radiant heat. This means that infrared grills can produce a very consistent cooking area, regardless of the surrounding temperature.

Quite Fuel Efficient

Infrared cooking maximizes flavor, saves on fuel and is much more convenient than standard grills. Not all infrared grills are fueled by gas because as technology advances, some electrical models have been created too.

Tastier Food with Retained Moisture

The moisture in food is also better retained by using infrared cooking, since standard grills cannot easily penetrate the moisture boundary present in food without disrupting it. When that happens, the food dries out because of hot air. Infrared heat easily penetrates the moisture barrier without breaking it apart. The result is that the cooked food is a lot juicier than food cooked with convection cooking systems.

Reviews of the Best Infrared Grills for 2018

1. Char-Broil The Big Easy TRU-Infrared Smoker Roaster & Grill

Now for something that isn’t just a grill because it lets you smoke, roast and grill in one single device. So, if you want evenly cooked ribs, or want to roast a turkey, this is the product for you. It can hold up to 25 pounds for roasting. For added flavor when cooking, you can use the smoker box with wood chips or pellets. The infrared technology, which is the same in all units of this brand makes it less prone to flare-ups and cooks food more evenly. The use of the fire box will allow you to cook food with many flavors, since different types of wood chips have different flavors. You can smoke your food using only that part of the unit. The especially designed propane burner is located between the outer and inner wall of the grill, so the heat fully encloses everything that is inside and escapes through the top chamber. Naturally, this also contributes to more thoroughly cooked food, as the heat does not come from only one direction. This helps keep the food’s moisture and keeps it tender, while the cooking time is nine minutes on average, which is faster than most other models. The temperatures it achieves can range from simmer to sear. The flow of hot air is limited in this grill. Instead, it uses more radiant heat to get the job done. This reduces cold or overly hot spots which can cause your food to burn.

Pros

  • Easy to assemble
  • The heat is evenly distributed by the walled burner
  • It’s easy to roast, grill and smoke

Cons

  • The smoker function is on the weak side and can be overtaken by the infrared heat
Check Price on Amazon

2. Char-Broil TRU-Infrared Patio Bistro Electric Grill

We’ll start with an electric unit. The technology for electric ones has advanced a lot in recent years, and they work even better with infrared technology. Now you can use your electric grill and get the same results you would on a traditional one. A little assembly is required to get this model up and running. The work required is not too excessive, but still a little more than other grills on the market as it will take you about 30 to 45 minutes. Once it’s set up, the unit looks and feels amazing. Everything on it says its top quality. You’ll immediately get the sense that the grill is going to last you a long time. There are no delicate parts or anything like that. Since this one is electric, you’ll never need to worry about running out of fuel in the middle of a grilling session, as long as you have electricity, of course. It runs from any normal outlet, so you just plug it in, turn it on and wait a few moments to start cooking. The unit uses Infrared technology and this allows for a better distribution of heat. The food is heated in such a way that it is not so easily burnt on the outside, so moisture and flavor are retained. This technology also allows for the heat to penetrate more easily, which means everything is cooked evenly. Of course, this grill can also be used if you live in a condo or an apartment where cooking with charcoal or using certain gas appliances may be restricted or prohibited. An electric grill like this one is ideal for those situations. Running on electricity also means that the unit does not have problems starting up, heating up and staying hot even in cold weather, so you can grill all year round. The domed lid will let you slow cook larger pieces of meat, or even an entire chicken. This is a key part of the design because lid allows for the heat to radiate and be kept inside, perfectly cooking the food. Another good feature is the included thermometer. With it, you can get the unit exactly as hot as you need it to be before you put the food in.

Pros

  • Easy set up
  • Incorporated thermometer
  • High quality construction
  • Heats up quickly

Cons

  • Cleaning can be cumbersome
  • Not ideal to cook with the lid open
Check Price on Amazon

3. Char-Broil Grill2Go X200 Portable TRU-Infrared Liquid Propane Gas Grill

Let’s continue with yet another model from a company that has been making grills and burners for seventy years. All those years of experience mean that they know grills and they sure put out some great ones like this particular infrared gas grill, which is also portable. This is a model meant for the adventurous grillers. It has a sturdy, rugged built, which makes it a great one for camping, the beach, or to take on any kind of excursion. The firebox and the lid are made from cast aluminum and the grilling grate and lid latches are made of stainless steel, and it has heat-resistant carrying handles on both sides. It has a simple and lightweight table top design, so you can you just relax or do other things while your food is grilling. The top handle is designed to let you open the hinged lid easily. The unit also incorporates the Char-Broil TRU-Infrared cooking system, which uses radiant heat instead of convective heat to cook your food, which cooks food faster and without drying it. You can cook a steak in 5 minutes and it will come out with all its juices and flavors. It can also be converted for use with a 20 lb. gas tank, in case you want to use it in an environment, where you won’t necessarily be moving it around a lot. The only problem with the unit is that it can get really hot at times and is tricky to control then.

Pros

  • Rugged, rust-resistant construction
  • Can be converted to use a 20lb gas tank

Cons

  • Gets really hot on the outside
  • Cooking temperature can be tricky to control
Check Price on Amazon

4. Solitaire Anywhere Portable Infrared Propane Gas Grill

This one is a very powerful unit, and surely one of the first things you’ll think when you see is that it’s built with quality. It is indeed well-built in a straightforward design. It has a commercial grade stainless steel construction that is all welded, so it’s very robust and there are no little hinge pieces that could come off. It features V-shaped stainless steel grids, with a ceramic burner and infrared technology. This combination reduces flare-ups and keeps food flavor when it’s cooked. The unit provides lots of evenly-distributed heat, all the while remaining compact. This certainly is an excellent unit, and one of the best you can buy if you’re going for portability. The burner design is the same as the one used in restaurants so, you’ll have professional quality, juicy food anywhere. In addition, the manufacturer offers a great range of accessories for use with their grills, such as portable stands, natural gas conversion kits and a variety of mounting plates and grids.

Pros

  • Compact and robust construction
  • Professional burner design
  • No assembly required
  • Can reach really high temperatures
  • Simple heat control

Cons

  • Grease is not exactly easy to drain
  • Sometimes blows out if there’s too much wind
  • Grill grate is hard to clean
Check Price on Amazon

5. Char-Broil Signature TRU-Infrared325 2-Burner Cabinet Liquid Propane 

This particular infrared unit is on the smaller size for a non-portable grill, but it’s still perfect for all the master grillers out there. It is certainly a well-designed quality product. This one is an elegant, very sturdily built grill that provides a large main cooking surface and features two stainless steel tube burners and porcelain-coated cast iron grates, which makes them resistant to rust and very easy to clean. It also includes a swing-away rack where you can keep food warm or use as a secondary cooking area. It has two metallic side shelves giving you plenty of space for preparing your food or for keeping your cooking utensils. These shelves can be folded down, so that it’s easier to move your grill around, and convenient for when you need to store it. Being made by Char-Broil, it incorporates their TRU-Infrared cooking system, which allows for better temperature control and distributes heat evenly across the cooking surface, so that food cooks faster and uses less gas. You can also convert it from propane to natural gas with a conversion kit, which is sold separately.

Pros

  • Great build quality
  • Can be converted to natural gas

Cons

  • The included thermometer only goes up to 650F
Check Price on Amazon

Conclusion

Now that we’ve seen all of these grills, it’s time for us to decide which one is the Best Infrared Grill for 2018. We have to say, we lean strongly in favor of the Char-Broil Big Easy. It really lives up to its name. It really is big enough to fit lots of food, easy enough to use and it’s really versatile, allowing to use it for three different functions and in different ways, even playing with the resulting flavors a little bit. It seems to us the Big Easy is the best model out there.

Title: 5 Best Rated George Foreman Grills In July 2018
Content:
Grilling is one of the best ways to cook your food and share it with friends and family but cooking with a charcoal or gas grill is not an option for many people as these types can be messy and difficult to use on some levels. This is where the best George Foreman grills come to play. A George Foreman type grill could be a convenient solution for people who cannot or do not want to use a traditional charcoal or gas grill. These give you the benefits of a traditional unit, while some also offer much more in the way of convenience and versatility. If you’ve been considering an affordable option for your home, to be used outdoors as well as indoors, then take a look at this list we’ve prepared. Here we have the George Foreman Grills for 2018. [supsystic-tables id=18]  

Reviews of the Best George Foreman Grills for 2018

1. George Foreman GGR50B Indoor/Outdoor Electric Grill

The unit blends convenience with function. Set up is fairly easy, and the build is very sturdy. It is also a George Foreman grill with removable plates, a grease tray, a domed lid with an adjustable vent, a power cord which includes the temperature control and a stand. The stand is made out of plastic and aluminum and the stabilizing legs all clip together, so you won’t need any tools when putting it together. Since the stand is removable, you’ll be able to take it from the backyard to the countertop in no time. The grill plate has a non-stick coating, called the George Tough Coating. It’s durable, easy to clean and lets you cook without using butter or oil. With five individual heat settings of the model, you can cook using slow heat all the way up to being able to using searing temperatures. The temperature control will surely be a familiar experience if you’ve used gas grills in the past and a new experience that you’re likely to welcome if you’ve only used charcoal grills. Whatever you want to cook, you’ll be able to easily adjust the temperature for it. Thanks to the electronic controls, heat is perfectly maintained and the unit has the ability to self-regulate by turning the heating element on or off. You don’t even have to think about it, just set the temperature and let it do what it has to do. You’ll also get the versatility of outdoor and indoor grilling. You can use it outside with the included stand or put on your counter, a picnic table or another heat-resistant surface. It won’t be a problem, since it has feet at the bottom. Of course, you can also use it inside with the stand. The construction itself is also built with two materials, just like the stand. The quality of the materials is appropriate for the price range, but that is not to say that they are of bad or cheap quality. Aluminum is used for the cooking surface and the lid. The cooking surface is coated in high quality Teflon, which is scratch resistant when used with wooden or plastic utensils. All in all, the build is rather good, making it a top rated George Foreman grill.

Pros

  • Easy to assembly
  • Sturdy construction
  • Can be used indoors and outdoors
  • Easy to clean up

Cons

  • Power cord should have been a few feet longer
  • A little too lightweight
Check Price on Amazon

2. George Foreman GFO201R Indoor/Outdoor Electric Grill

This one is very easy to set up, so if you’re buying online, that should not be one of your concerns. The whole thing takes about thirty minutes to put together and all the tools you will need is a Phillips head screwdriver. The first thing you’ll notice when getting the unit out of the box is its high quality and unique design. This particular model is meant for both indoor and outdoor use, so you’ll have the freedom and versatility to cook how you want to cook. There is another feature of the design: the cooking surface is sloped, which allows for the fat to drip into a collection tray while you’re cooking the food. This means that your food will have close to half the amount of fat it would have if it had been cooked on an ordinary cooking surface. You’ll also be able to achieve searing temperatures with this grill, so your food will not be left without moisture. This one surely looks and feels like a high quality appliance. We won’t say that it’s not, but in the price range this grill is found, compromises are inevitable. Although for the price, you will not be disappointed. The one negative thing that can be said about its construction is that the stand, being made of plastic, is not as heavy as it could be. There is the possibility of it not being able to withstand very strong winds. But it’s still stable in most conditions. The cooking surface is perfectly coated in Teflon. It’s very well put together, so you don’t have to worry about this grill falling apart even after years of use.

Pros

  • Suitable for indoor and outdoor use
  • Easy assembly

Cons

  • The stand could be a little heavier
Check Price on Amazon

3. George Foreman GRP4EMB Multi-Plate Evolve Grill

The unit aims to take care not only of your grilling needs, but you can also use it to deep-dish bake or even cook muffins. It’s affordable, versatile and easy to use. The model has an attractive design with high quality metals and plastics. The cooking plates are solid but not too heavy that are attached easily, so that you won’t have to waste any time setting it up. Aside from the high quality construction, an obvious benefit of the unit is that you’ll be able to use it not just for grilling. With the interchangeable plates, you’ll be able to cook different kinds of foods. The standard grill plate is just as good as you would expect and it’s slanted so that the fat drips onto the dripping tray. The result of this design creates food cooked with far less fat. It’s perfect if you’re on a low fat diet. You can cook a steak perfectly with little fat and while retaining all of its moisture. With the deep dish tray, you can cook bread, pizza, vegetables or just about anything you want to put in there. The cupcake and muffin tray looks just like a regular tray of its kind, but it’s been designed to fit the grill. The grilling process is simple. There isn’t a lot of mess thanks to the dripping tray and it’s very easy to clean up. The removable cooking plates can be put in the dishwasher, which is something you probably won’t have to do every time, since you can just use paper towels to clean this up. The unit reaches full temperature in about five minutes and it will maintain whatever temperature you select. There is also a timer included, so you can ensure perfect cooking times. But the deep dish tray is probably the star of the show for the Evolve. This is the most versatile accessory and you can do practically anything on it from scrambled eggs to toasted sandwiches. You do have to be careful with the amount you pour into the deep dish tray. If you put too much in there, it might overflow and create a bit of a mess. The cooking trays and release handles feel sturdy, which is important because the whole idea is that you’ll be switching those out very often. In case of any problems, the tray accessories can be purchased separately and you can get additional ones.

Pros

  • High quality sturdy construction
  • Interchangeable plates
  • Includes a thermometer

Cons

  • Oiling is sometimes needed on the plates
  • Clean up can be messy if it overflows
Check Price on Amazon

4. George Foreman GRP90WGR Next Grilleration Electric Nonstick Grill

This is another great model with removable plates. Although a little smaller than the previous one, this one also offers lots of versatility. You get five removable grill plates: two grill plates, two waffle plates and a griddle or deep dish tray. You’ll have no need to buy any other accessories, they already come with the unit. So you’ll be able to have waffles for breakfast, Paninis for lunch and steak for dinner by cooking them all on the same appliance. The unit can be easily cleaned without even using the dishwasher, thanks to its detachable plates. Just be a little careful to ensure that you don’t end up damaging the nonstick surface while cleaning the countertop grill. Another good thing about the model is that it has a temperature control knob which you no longer need to unplug the appliance to turn it off. Although it’s only marked “1”, “2” and “3”, which is equivalent to low, medium and high, it’s better than nothing. This grill is definitely worth it if you’re looking for something easy to use that offers the versatility of interchangeable plates and temperature control.

Pros

  • Plenty of interchangeable plates
  • Dishwasher-safe plates
  • Temperature control

Cons

  • The top grill plate might be a little harder to clean because of its pattern
Check Price on Amazon

5. George Foreman GRP1060B 4 Serving Removable Plate Grill

This is a small, ultra-light table-top unit that can cook up to four servings, so it’s definitely not for grill parties or gatherings. However, its small size does not necessarily make it less powerful. In fact, the build quality and the material of the plates are of the superior variety. The plates on the equipment are also removable, although this is only for the convenience of cleaning them in the dishwasher. It does not come with plates other than the ones for regular grilling. The plates are non-stick, so you won’t need butter or oil when cooking and they are durable enough to resist constant use or constant cleaning. Another great feature of this model is that it heats up fast allowing you to expect your food to be ready in about ten minutes. Go for this one if you are a beginner in the field and want to cook up small meals initially.

Pros

  • Removable, dishwasher safe plates
  • Heats up fast

Cons

  • No temperature control
  • Short power cord
Check Price on Amazon

What Should Be Your Pick?

What is the Best George Foreman Grill for 2018? With so many options, it’s really hard to tell. If you’re looking for one that you can as a backyard grill as well as on the tabletop, then we say go with the GGR50B Indoor/Outdoor Grill. It offers great value for the money and the only real disadvantage is that part of its construction is plastic. You can even choose it if you want to replace a charcoal or a gas one. But if you’re looking for something that is a little bit more than a grill, then we say choose the Multi-Plate Evolve model. It’s one of the most versatile models which is also easy to use and you will not be limiting yourself to just grilling. You’ll be able to cook different types of food, although in relatively small amounts.

Why Should You Invest on a George Foreman Grill?

There are benefits to having and using an electric grill like the George Foreman type grills. In some cases, it can even replace a conventional gas or charcoal grill.

Availability of Fuel Does Not Affect the Operation

One of the biggest benefits is that, as long as there is electricity, you never have to worry about fuel and you’ll never have difficulty lighting up your grill. The weather will not be a problem for you either.

Comes with Fat Reducing Feature

A striking aspect of the George Foreman grills is their ability to drain out the fat from the food item, which is the main reason why they are popularly referred to as the George Foreman Lean Mean Fat-Reducing Grilling Machine.

A Lot More Energy Efficient

Electric grills are also energy-efficient as you only need to have it on for the amount of time that you’ll be using it. There’s no waiting a long time for the equipment to reach the desired temperature and there are no long cool down periods afterwards.

Easy to Clean

Ease of cleaning is another benefit. The George Foreman grills are designed to be easy to clean, and include non-stick coating to allow you to clean the grates with a towel even before they have completely cooled down. In some models, the grilling plates can be thrown in the dishwasher too.
